channel.title: Phising on My notes and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Phising on My notes and snippets

item.title: phising
item.description: Phising Session Hijack Steal creds and/or session cookies. Can be useful when client has good prevention against shells. Email a link to a target employee pointing to a cloned/proxied auth portal (Microsoft Online(O365, Azure), G-suite. AWS Console). When they auth they get a real session cookies, and so do we. Tools: Evilginx2, Modlishka # MOVE TO OWN TOOL PAGE When we get session we need to act fast and setup persistence.
